attributes.action: amend the Children's Act by giving final responsibility for child carers - children who look after chronically ill parents - to a single agency, and urgently to address the issue of government funding to ensure the future of existing support centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is shocking that the support and protection offered to young carers in Britain is funded by charitable donations.  The government must recognise its responsibility towards these children.
